title: 'Fake product'
body: 'In the picture The first cover is of the product that is usually available in all medical shops etc and the second one is the one I purchased here on Amazon. I Initially thought itâ€™s just a difference in packaging but gradually I started to see the difference. - The outer packaging is almost same as the original product. - the packaging is different from inside for each piece. - once you stick the product it would not come out easily. It would remain stuck and you would need to wash the cloth to get it off. - the product would tear off while removing (imagine the mess it creates) Itâ€™s very difficult to handle the product. - it always keeps leaking from sides. I would like to give no stars (zero stars) for this product as itâ€™s not applicable for review. Itâ€™s the worst product you can think of in your challenging days when you need to depend on it the most. I have thrown the whole pack as itâ€™s not even worth giving to someone in need as itâ€™s not gonna help them in anyway. Kindly donâ€™t see the discounts and buy this product. Itâ€™s a fake product!!'

title: 'Cheap
body: '1.0 out of 5 stars''Previously same product was little bit thick but now it is very thin in quality.'

title: 'Comfortable to use except scent'
body: 'It is very comfortable to wear but recently they have added scent to it which causes rash and itching. Unscented version was perfect. Please bring that back .'

title: Don't buy from R K WorldInfocom pvt ltd
body: I have been using this from years but this time it's just too much thin. Looks like got fake product. The seller was R K WorldInfocom pvt ltd. So be aware!

title: 'Packaging'
body: The most horrible part of the product being delivered was, that it wasn't put in a packet. It was delivered just as the packaging of the product is. This is India.,family is not comfortable with open packages of sanitary pads . This should be really understood and considered. Your trying to be sustainable by this , what about other packages that came in plastic. There is no balance.

title: 'Equal to tissue paper. Poor Quality since past few months. Disappointed'
body: As a regular buyer since more than 6 years now, I've seen the product quality degrading for every purchase. The layers of the pad separate extremely easily. And the inner abosorbant opens falls apart like cotton. Can't even use it for 30 mins. Even the slightest movements will make the pad tear easily. Very delicate like a tissue paper. If this goes on, the women associations will soon approach the consumer court.

title: WINGS THAT FIT AND DON'T HURT THE SKIN
body: 'ONLY NAPKINS THAT I HAVE FOUND THAT ARE ABSORBENT YET SO COMFORTABLE'

title: 'It is D grade.product is not original'

body: 'Actually helps you walk carefree a little expensive.'

title: 'Fake product. Dont buy.'
body: Worst and fake product. I used two pads..they can't stick to the panty at all. At first i thought it's just the sticking issue. But later on the same day, i brought the same product from the market..and it has different design internally. I am not even sure now that this product is fake or what! Very disappointed . Wasted my 1000 bucks!

title: 'Comfort and easy to use'
body: 'Pads are good with great absorbent power. They are comfortable and easy to use'
